title: John Smith on the Virginia colony - context

content.question: Smith’s description of the Pamunkey people’s interactions with the Virginia colonists best serves as evidence of which of the following characteristics of American Indians along the Eastern Seaboard in the 1600s?

choices.label: A dependence on English trade goods
Decreased populations due to epidemic disease

topic.text: 1.2: Native American Societies Before European Contact
